description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide Ready Use Material Inventories to Department of National Defence at Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton (FMFCB), Victoria, BC and Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott (FMFCS), Halifax, NS. Canada intends to issue a maximum of two standing offers for a three (3) year term with options for up to two (2) additional one (1) year terms.
full_summary:
================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Standing Offer

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is seeking offers from qualified suppliers for the provision of Ready Use Material Inventories.

**Contract Details**

* **Title**: W3555-249706 - RISO Ready Use Materials Inventory
* **Reference Number**: WS4320973921-Doc4580528283
* **Amendment Number**: 8
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4320973921
* **Publication Date**: 5 June 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: 26 July 2024, 14:00:00 (EST)
* **Amendment Date**: 22 July 2024

**Scope of Work**

The successful bidder will provide Ready Use Material Inventories to the Department of National Defence at Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Breton (FMFCB) and Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott (FMFCS) in British Columbia and Nova Scotia, respectively. The contract term is three years, with options for two additional one-year extensions.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
